text: For the bigger ones I think dneg and for mid size ones I'd say between where I'm currently at or jellyfish, although everywhere I've been I think I've had a good experience. I've been to very few places where I've said that I would never go back to. I've heard from a few of my friends that they would not go back to MPC though. They tend to underpay quite a lot as they know juniors will accept it just to work on a big project. They also do not treat their staff very good but asking staff to work lots of extra unpaid hours
Noted ahah, MPC is not on the radar. Are you working on any personal projects? The kind of stand out projects you would usually put in your reel :grin:
